quotes: Jens Stoltenberg became NATO Secretary General in October 2014
Mr. Stoltenberg’s mandate as NATO Secretary General has been extended until the end of September 2022.
Before coming to NATO, he was the UN Special Envoy on Climate Change from 2013 to 2014.
Mr. Stoltenberg was also Prime Minister during the deadly terrorist attacks, which killed 77 people in Oslo and Utøya on 22 July 2011
2005-2013: Prime Minister of Norway

2000-2001: Prime Minister of Norway
1996-1997: Minister of Finance
1993-1996: Minister of Industry and Energy
1991-2014: Member of Parliament
1990-1991: State Secretary at the Ministry of the Environment
1985-1989: Leader of the Norwegian Labour Youth
Jens Stoltenberg was born in Oslo on 16 March 1959.
After graduating in 1987, he held a research post at the National Statistical Institute of Norway
